about_the_game:
This DLC adds one new scene for the following: Berowne, Rosaline, Maria, Longaville, Katharine, and Dumaine. The camp setting receives no additional scenes.

Allows you the chance to get one more reputation point with any character.

THE NEW SCENES DO NOT AFFECT PATH ACHIEVEMENTS.
detailed_description:
This DLC adds one new scene for the following: Berowne, Rosaline, Maria, Longaville, Katharine, and Dumaine. The camp setting receives no additional scenes.

Allows you the chance to get one more reputation point with any character.

THE NEW SCENES DO NOT AFFECT PATH ACHIEVEMENTS.

short_description: This DLC adds one new scene for the following: Berowne, Rosaline, Maria, Longaville, Katharine, and Dumaine. All sales go to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.
